column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Called in our pizza at 10:00 and told them we would be arriving at 10:30 to grab a table! Got their at 10:30 was seated right away
column2: ordered the bruschetta while we waited for our pizza to cook
column3: the bruschetta was AMAZING! The ingredients were fresh
column4: we devoured this. We ordered a medium half cheese half deep dish. Both sides were very good
column5: I liked the cheese better though!
